emails.Title: Re: Crops Won't Grow on Trees
emails.BodyText: Thanks! The cleared plot will be perfect for my farm!

emails.Title: Re: Golfing Club
emails.BodyText: Thank you. The golf course is now under construction, and our guild is pleased with the results.

emails.Title: Re: Government Developments
emails.BodyText: Thank you for your services. My approval ratings are quickly going up after this new development. Signed, Ms. President

emails.Title: Re: OIL
emails.BodyText: The oil rig is now successfully going under operation! Our shareholders will be very pleased.

emails.Title: Re: Trash
emails.BodyText: Thank you for your services. The landfill is now under construction.

emails.Title: Re: Rockets and Missiles
emails.BodyText: Thank you for your services. Now the world can see our military might in action!

emails.Title: Re: Space for Race
emails.BodyText: Thanks for clearing out the area for the launch pad! Our first mission to Mars is scheduled for today.

emails.Title: Re: For Science
emails.BodyText: Spasibo! You will be handsomely rewarded for your contributions to the Russian legacy.
